Name: Fragment of scene
Description: A limestone fragment of a scene, from either a stela or a wall. The scene depicts the god Amun handing the emblems of the Sed-festival to King Amenmesse. The god wears the distinctive tall, plumed headdress, collar, armlets and bracelets. Only the hand of the king remains to be seen.The workmanship is very fine and the preservation was described as 'good'.
